web_snippets: Biography. Pete Coe: A One Man ... He's still one of the most committed, most versatile, most important folk artists in Britain. Pete Coe – short biography.
Pete Coe is a renowned English songwriter, performer, promoter and researcher with more than 50 years on the English Folk scene.
